org_midgardproject_projectsite_document.title: Installation
org_midgardproject_projectsite_document.content: <div><p>The easiest way to install Midgard MVC is by using the midgardmvc_installer tool. You can install the tool with PEAR by running the following:</p></div><div><pre>$ sudo pear channel-discover pear.indeyets.pp.ru<br />$ sudo pear install indeyets/midgardmvc_installer</pre></div><div><p>After this you can install Midgard MVC applications by pointing the Midgard MVC installer to a application configuration YAML file and a target directory. For example:</p></div><div><pre>$ midgardmvc install https://github.com/bergie/org_midgardproject_productsite/raw/master/rdf.yml ~/midgardexample<br /></pre></div><div><p>The Midgard MVC installer will install Midgard MVC, and all components and libraries required by the application. It will also generate a Midgard2 database for the application. Now running the application is easy:</p><pre>$ ~/midgardexample/run</pre></div><div><p>By default the <a href="https://github.com/indeyets/appserver-in-php/wiki">AppServer in PHP</a> used for running Midgard MVC will be available in <a href="http://localhost:8001">http://localhost:8001</a>.</p></div>
